subject: Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Belmont Stakes
Horse Racing
California Chrome (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: California Chrome galloped again in preparations for the Belmont Stakes, while a new contender trained by Todd Pletcher emerged for the last leg of the Triple Crown.
snippet: California Chrome galloped again in preparations for the Belmont Stakes, while a new contender trained by Todd Pletcher emerged for the last leg of the Triple Crown.
